class="line">73</span><br><span class="line">74</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="meta">@SpringBootApplication</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@EnableEurekaClient</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@EnableFeignClients</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@MapperScan(basePackages = {"com.changgou.seckill.dao"})</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@EnableScheduling</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@EnableAsync</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">class</span> <span class="title class_">SeckillApplication</span> {</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">static</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">main</span><span class="params">(String[] args)</span> {</span><br><span class="line"> SpringApplication.run(SeckillApplication.class,args);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> IdWorker <span class="title function_">idWorker</span><span class="params">()</span>{</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">IdWorker</span>(<span class="number">1</span>,<span class="number">1</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Autowired</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> Environment env;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 创建DirectExchange交换机</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> DirectExchange <span class="title function_">basicExchange</span><span class="params">()</span>{</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">DirectExchange</span>(env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.exchange.order"</span>), <span class="literal">true</span>,<span class="literal">false</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 创建队列</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Bean(name = "queueOrder")</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> Queue <span class="title function_">queueOrder</span><span class="params">()</span>{</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">Queue</span>(env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.queue.order"</span>), <span class="literal">true</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 创建秒杀队列</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Bean(name = "queueSeckillOrder")</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> Queue <span class="title function_">queueSeckillOrder</span><span class="params">()</span>{</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">Queue</span>(env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.queue.seckillorder"</span>), <span class="literal">true</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/****</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 队列绑定到交换机上</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> Binding <span class="title function_">basicBindingOrder</span><span class="params">()</span>{</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> BindingBuilder</span><br><span class="line"> .bind(queueOrder())</span><br><span class="line"> .to(basicExchange())</span><br><span class="line"> .with(env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.routing.orderkey"</span>));</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/****</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 队列绑定到交换机上</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> Binding <span class="title function_">basicBindingSeckillOrder</span><span class="params">()</span>{</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> BindingBuilder</span><br><span class="line"> .bind(queueSeckillOrder())</span><br><span class="line"> .to(basicExchange())</span><br><span class="line"> .with(env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.routing.seckillorderkey"</span>));</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>修改application.yml文件，添加如下配置：</p> <figure class="highlight properties"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">#位置支付交换机和队列</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="attr">mq</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">pay</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">exchange</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">order</span>: <span class="string">exchange.order</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">seckillorder</span>: <span class="string">exchange.seckillorder</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">queue</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">order</span>: <span class="string">queue.order</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">seckillorder</span>: <span class="string">queue.seckillorder</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">routing</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">key</span>: <span class="string">queue.order</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">seckillkey</span>: <span class="string">queue.seckillorder</span></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h4 id="3-4-3-修改订单状态"><a href="#3-4-3-修改订单状态" class="headerlink" title="3.4.3 修改订单状态"></a>3.4.3 修改订单状态</h4><p>监听到支付信息后，根据支付信息判断，如果用户支付成功，则修改订单信息，并将订单入库，删除用户排队信息，如果用户支付失败，则删除订单信息，回滚库存，删除用户排队信息。</p> <h5 id="3-4-3-1-业务层"><a href="#3-4-3-1-业务层" class="headerlink" title="3.4.3.1 业务层"></a>3.4.3.1 业务层</h5><p>修改SeckillOrderService，添加修改订单方法，代码如下</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 更新订单状态</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> out_trade_no</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> transaction_id</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> username</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">updatePayStatus</span><span class="params">(String out_trade_no, String transaction_id,String username)</span>;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>修改SeckillOrderServiceImpl，添加修改订单方法实现，代码如下：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br><span class="line">16</span><br><span class="line">17</span><br><span class="line">18</span><br><span class="line">19</span><br><span class="line">20</span><br><span class="line">21</span><br><span class="line">22</span><br><span class="line">23</span><br><span class="line">24</span><br><span class="line">25</span><br><span class="line">26</span><br><span class="line">27</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 更新订单状态</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> out_trade_no</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> transaction_id</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> username</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@Override</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">updatePayStatus</span><span class="params">(String out_trade_no, String transaction_id,String username)</span> {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//订单数据从Redis数据库查询出来</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">SeckillOrder</span> <span class="variable">seckillOrder</span> <span class="operator">=</span> (SeckillOrder) redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"SeckillOrder"</span>).get(username);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//修改状态</span></span><br><span class="line"> seckillOrder.setStatus(<span class="string">"1"</span>);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//支付时间</span></span><br><span class="line"> seckillOrder.setPayTime(<span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">Date</span>());</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//同步到MySQL中</span></span><br><span class="line"> seckillOrderMapper.insertSelective(seckillOrder);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//清空Redis缓存</span></span><br><span class="line"> redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"SeckillOrder"</span>).delete(username);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//清空用户排队数据</span></span><br><span class="line"> redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"UserQueueCount"</span>).delete(username);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//删除抢购状态信息</span></span><br><span class="line"> redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"UserQueueStatus"</span>).delete(username);</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h5 id="3-4-3-2-修改订单对接"><a href="#3-4-3-2-修改订单对接" class="headerlink" title="3.4.3.2 修改订单对接"></a>3.4.3.2 修改订单对接</h5><p>修改微信支付状态监听的代码，当用户支付成功后，修改订单状态，也就是调用上面的方法，代码如下：</p> <p><img src="C:/Users/再难也会过/Desktop/尚硅谷SSM笔记/畅购商城/畅购-讲师源码md课件等www.cx1314.cn/畅购-讲师源码md课件/day14续/讲义/images/1558839807871.png" alt="1558839807871"></p> <h4 id="3-4-4-删除订单回滚库存"><a href="#3-4-4-删除订单回滚库存" class="headerlink" title="3.4.4 删除订单回滚库存"></a>3.4.4 删除订单回滚库存</h4><p>如果用户支付失败，我们需要删除用户订单数据，并回滚库存。</p> <h5 id="3-4-4-1-业务层实现"><a href="#3-4-4-1-业务层实现" class="headerlink" title="3.4.4.1 业务层实现"></a>3.4.4.1 业务层实现</h5><p>修改SeckillOrderService，创建一个关闭订单方法，代码如下：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 关闭订单，回滚库存</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">closeOrder</span><span class="params">(String username)</span>;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>修改SeckillOrderServiceImpl，创建一个关闭订单实现方法，代码如下：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br><span class="line">16</span><br><span class="line">17</span><br><span class="line">18</span><br><span class="line">19</span><br><span class="line">20</span><br><span class="line">21</span><br><span class="line">22</span><br><span class="line">23</span><br><span class="line">24</span><br><span class="line">25</span><br><span class="line">26</span><br><span class="line">27</span><br><span class="line">28</span><br><span class="line">29</span><br><span class="line">30</span><br><span class="line">31</span><br><span class="line">32</span><br><span class="line">33</span><br><span class="line">34</span><br><span class="line">35</span><br><span class="line">36</span><br><span class="line">37</span><br><span class="line">38</span><br><span class="line">39</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 关闭订单，回滚库存</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> username</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@Override</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">closeOrder</span><span class="params">(String username)</span> {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//将消息转换成SeckillStatus</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">SeckillStatus</span> <span class="variable">seckillStatus</span> <span class="operator">=</span> (SeckillStatus) redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"UserQueueStatus"</span>).get(username);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//获取Redis中订单信息</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">SeckillOrder</span> <span class="variable">seckillOrder</span> <span class="operator">=</span> (SeckillOrder) redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"SeckillOrder"</span>).get(username);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//如果Redis中有订单信息，说明用户未支付</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">if</span>(seckillStatus!=<span class="literal">null</span> && seckillOrder!=<span class="literal">null</span>){</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//删除订单</span></span><br><span class="line"> redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"SeckillOrder"</span>).delete(username);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//回滚库存</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//1)从Redis中获取该商品</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">SeckillGoods</span> <span class="variable">seckillGoods</span> <span class="operator">=</span> (SeckillGoods) redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"SeckillGoods_"</span>+seckillStatus.getTime()).get(seckillStatus.getGoodsId());</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//2)如果Redis中没有，则从数据库中加载</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">if</span>(seckillGoods==<span class="literal">null</span>){</span><br><span class="line"> seckillGoods = seckillGoodsMapper.selectByPrimaryKey(seckillStatus.getGoodsId());</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//3)数量+1 (递增数量+1，队列数量+1)</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">Long</span> <span class="variable">surplusCount</span> <span class="operator">=</span> redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"SeckillGoodsCount"</span>).increment(seckillStatus.getGoodsId(), <span class="number">1</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> seckillGoods.setStockCount(surplusCount.intValue());</span><br><span class="line"> redisTemplate.boundListOps(<span class="string">"SeckillGoodsCountList_"</span> + seckillStatus.getGoodsId()).leftPush(seckillStatus.getGoodsId());</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//4)数据同步到Redis中</span></span><br><span class="line"> redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"SeckillGoods_"</span>+seckillStatus.getTime()).put(seckillStatus.getGoodsId(),seckillGoods);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//清理排队标示</span></span><br><span class="line"> redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"UserQueueCount"</span>).delete(seckillStatus.getUsername());</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//清理抢单标示</span></span><br><span class="line"> redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"UserQueueStatus"</span>).delete(seckillStatus.getUsername());</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h5 id="3-4-4-2-调用删除订单"><a href="#3-4-4-2-调用删除订单" class="headerlink" title="3.4.4.2 调用删除订单"></a>3.4.4.2 调用删除订单</h5><p>修改SeckillOrderPayMessageListener，在用户支付失败后调用关闭订单方法，代码如下：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">//支付失败,删除订单</span></span><br><span class="line">seckillOrderService.closeOrder(attachMap.get(<span class="string">"username"</span>));</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h5 id="3-4-4-3-测试"><a href="#3-4-4-3-测试" class="headerlink" title="3.4.4.3 测试"></a>3.4.4.3 测试</h5><p>使用Postman完整请求创建二维码下单测试一次。</p> <p>商品ID：1131814854034853888</p> <p>数量：49</p> <p><img src="C:/Users/再难也会过/Desktop/尚硅谷SSM笔记/畅购商城/畅购-讲师源码md课件等www.cx1314.cn/畅购-讲师源码md课件/day14续/讲义/images/1558851734898.png" alt="1558851734898"></p> <p>下单：</p> <p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener" <p><img src="C:/Users/再难也会过/Desktop/尚硅谷SSM笔记/畅购商城/畅购-讲师源码md课件等www.cx1314.cn/畅购-讲师源码md课件/day14续/讲义/images/1558851403264.png" alt="1558851403264"></p> <p>下单查询：</p> <p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener" nonce_str=a1aefe00a9bc4e8bb66a892dba38eb42<span class="punctuation">,</span></span><br><span class="line"> bank_type=CMB_CREDIT<span class="punctuation">,</span></span><br><span class="line"> openid=oNpSGwUp<span class="number">-194</span>-Svy3JnVlAxtdLkc<span class="punctuation">,</span></span><br><span class="line"> sign=<span class="number">56679</span>BC02CC82204635434817C1FCA46<span class="attr">mapper-locations</span>: <span class="string">classpath:mapper/*Mapper.xml</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">type-aliases-package</span>: <span class="string">com.changgou.seckill.pojo</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">#hystrix 配置</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="attr">hystrix</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">command</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">default</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">execution</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">enabled</span>: <span class="string">true</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">isolation</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span <span class="attr">strategy</span>: <span class="string">SEMAPHORE</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">#位置支付交换机和队列</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="attr">mq</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">pay</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">exchange</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">order</span>: <span class="string">exchange.order</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">queue</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">order</span>: <span class="string">queue.order</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">seckillorder</span>: <span class="string">queue.seckillorder</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">routing</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">orderkey</span>: <span class="string">queue.order</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">seckillorderkey</span>: <span class="string">queue.seckillorder</span></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h2 id="4-RabbitMQ延时消息队列"><a href="#4-RabbitMQ延时消息队列" class="headerlink" title="4 RabbitMQ延时消息队列"></a>4 RabbitMQ延时消息队列</h2><h3 id="4-1-延时队列介绍"><a href="#4-1-延时队列介绍" class="headerlink" title="4.1 延时队列介绍"></a>4.1 延时队列介绍</h3><p>延时队列即放置在该队列里面的消息是不需要立即消费的，而是等待一段时间之后取出消费。<br>那么，为什么需要延迟消费呢？我们来看以下的场景</p> <p>网上商城下订单后30分钟后没有完成支付，取消订单(如：淘宝、去哪儿网)<br>系统创建了预约之后，需要在预约时间到达前一小时提醒被预约的双方参会<br>系统中的业务失败之后，需要重试<br>这些场景都非常常见，我们可以思考，比如第二个需求，系统创建了预约之后，需要在预约时间到达前一小时提醒被预约的双方参会。那么一天之中肯定是会有很多个预约的，时间也是不一定的，假设现在有1点 2点 3点 三个预约，如何让系统知道在当前时间等于0点 1点 2点给用户发送信息呢，是不是需要一个轮询，一直去查看所有的预约，比对当前的系统时间和预约提前一小时的时间是否相等呢？这样做非常浪费资源而且轮询的时间间隔不好控制。如果我们使用延时消息队列呢，我们在创建时把需要通知的预约放入消息中间件中，并且设置该消息的过期时间，等过期时间到达时再取出消费即可。</p> <p>Rabbitmq实现延时队列一般而言有两种形式：<br>第一种方式：利用两个特性： Time To Live(TTL)、Dead Letter Exchanges（DLX）[A队列过期->转发给B队列]</p> <p>第二种方式：利用rabbitmq中的插件x-delay-message</p> <h3 id="4-2-TTL-DLX实现延时队列"><a href="#4-2-TTL-DLX实现延时队列" class="headerlink" title="4.2 TTL DLX实现延时队列"></a>4.2 TTL DLX实现延时队列</h3><h4 id="4-2-1-TTL-DLX介绍"><a href="#4-2-1-TTL-DLX介绍" class="headerlink" title="4.2.1 TTL DLX介绍"></a>4.2.1 TTL DLX介绍</h4><p><strong>TTL</strong><br>RabbitMQ可以针对队列设置x-expires(则队列中所有的消息都有相同的过期时间)或者针对Message设置x-message-ttl(对消息进行单独设置，每条消息TTL可以不同)，来控制消息的生存时间，如果超时(两者同时设置以最先到期的时间为准)，则消息变为dead letter(死信)</p> <p><strong>Dead Letter Exchanges（DLX）</strong><br>RabbitMQ的Queue可以配置x-dead-letter-exchange和x-dead-letter-routing-key（可选）两个参数，如果队列内出现了dead letter，则按照这两个参数重新路由转发到指定的队列。<br>x-dead-letter-exchange：出现dead letter之后将dead letter重新发送到指定exchange</p> <p>x-dead-letter-routing-key：出现dead letter之后将dead letter重新按照指定的routing-key发送</p> <p><img src="C:/Users/再难也会过/Desktop/尚硅谷SSM笔记/畅购商城/畅购-讲师源码md课件等www.cx1314.cn/畅购-讲师源码md课件/day14续/讲义/images/1557396863944.png" alt="1557396863944"></p> <h4 id="4-2-3-DLX延时队列实现"><a href="#4-2-3-DLX延时队列实现" class="headerlink" title="4.2.3 DLX延时队列实现"></a>4.2.3 DLX延时队列实现</h4><h5 id="4-2-3-1-创建工程"><a href="#4-2-3-1-创建工程" class="headerlink" title="4.2.3.1 创建工程"></a>4.2.3.1 创建工程</h5><p>创建springboot_rabbitmq_delay工程，并引入相关依赖</p> <figure class="highlight xml"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br><span class="line">16</span><br><span class="line">17</span><br><span class="line">18</span><br><span class="line">19</span><br><span class="line">20</span><br><span class="line">21</span><br><span class="line">22</span><br><span class="line">23</span><br><span class="line">24</span><br><span class="line">25</span><br><span class="line">26</span><br><span class="name">artifactId</span>></span>springboot_rabbitmq_delay<span class="tag"></<span class="name">artifactId</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"><<span class="name">dependencies</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment"><!--starter-web--></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"><<span class="name">dependency</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"><<span class="name">groupId</span>></span>org.springframework.boot<span class="tag"></<span class="name">groupId</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"><<span class="name">artifactId</span>></span>spring-boot-starter-web<span class="tag"></<span class="name">artifactId</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"></<span class="name">dependency</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment"><!--加入ampq--></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"><<span class="name">dependency</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"><<span class="name">groupId</span>></span>org.springframework.boot<span class="tag"></<span class="name">groupId</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"><<span class="name">artifactId</span>></span>spring-boot-starter-amqp<span class="tag"></<span class="name">artifactId</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"></<span <figure class="highlight properties"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="string">guest</span></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h5 id="4-2-3-2-队列创建"><a href="#4-2-3-2-队列创建" class="headerlink" title="4.2.3.2 队列创建"></a>4.2.3.2 队列创建</h5><p>创建2个队列，用于接收消息的叫延时队列queue.message.delay，用于转发消息的队列叫queue.message，同时创建一个交换机，代码如下：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br><span class="line">16</span><br><span class="line">17</span><br><span class="line">18</span><br><span class="line">19</span><br><span class="line">20</span><br><span class="line">21</span><br><span class="line">22</span><br><span class="line">23</span><br><span class="line">24</span><br><span class="line">25</span><br><span class="line">26</span><br><span class="line">27</span><br><span class="line">28</span><br><span class="line">29</span><br><span class="line">30</span><br><span class="line">31</span><br><span class="line">32</span><br><span class="line">33</span><br><span class="line">34</span><br><span class="line">35</span><br><span class="line">36</span><br><span class="line">37</span><br><span class="line">38</span><br><span class="line">39</span><br><span class="line">40</span><br><span class="line">41</span><br><span class="line">42</span><br><span class="line">43</span><br><span class="line">44</span><br><span class="line">45</span><br><span class="line">46</span><br><span class="line">47</span><br><span class="line">48</span><br><span class="line">49</span><br><span class="line">50</span><br><span class="line">51</span><br><span class="line">52</span><br><span class="line">53</span><br><span class="line">54</span><br><span class="line">55</span><br><span class="line">56</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="meta">@Configuration</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">class</span> <span class="title class_">QueueConfig</span> {</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/** 短信发送队列 */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">static</span> <span class="keyword">final</span> <span class="type">String</span> <span class="variable">QUEUE_MESSAGE</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="string">"queue.message"</span>;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/** 交换机 */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">static</span> <span class="keyword">final</span> <span class="type">String</span> <span class="variable">DLX_EXCHANGE</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="string">"dlx.exchange"</span>;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/** 短信发送队列 延迟缓冲（按消息） */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">static</span> <span class="keyword">final</span> <span class="type">String</span> <span class="variable">QUEUE_MESSAGE_DELAY</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="string">"queue.message.delay"</span>;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/**</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 短信发送队列</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> Queue <span class="title function_">messageQueue</span><span class="params">()</span> {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">Queue</span>(QUEUE_MESSAGE, <span class="literal">true</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/**</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 短信发送队列</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> Queue <span class="title function_">delayMessageQueue</span><span class="params">()</span> {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> QueueBuilder.durable(QUEUE_MESSAGE_DELAY)</span><br><span class="line"> .withArgument(<span class="string">"x-dead-letter-exchange"</span>, DLX_EXCHANGE) <span class="comment">// 消息超时进入死信队列，绑定死信队列交换机</span></span><br><span class="line"> .withArgument(<span class="string">"x-dead-letter-routing-key"</span>, QUEUE_MESSAGE) <span class="comment">// 绑定指定的routing-key</span></span><br><span class="line"> .build();</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 创建交换机</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> DirectExchange <span class="title function_">directExchange</span><span class="params">()</span>{</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">DirectExchange</span>(DLX_EXCHANGE);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 交换机与队列绑定</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> messageQueue</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> directExchange</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> Binding <span class="title function_">basicBinding</span><span class="params">(Queue messageQueue, DirectExchange directExchange)</span> {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> BindingBuilder.bind(messageQueue)</span><br><span class="line"> .to(directExchange)</span><br><span class="line"> .with(QUEUE_MESSAGE);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h5 id="4-2-3-3-消息监听"><a href="#4-2-3-3-消息监听" class="headerlink" title="4.2.3.3 消息监听"></a>4.2.3.3 消息监听</h5><p>创建MessageListener用于监听消息，代码如下：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br><span class="line">16</span><br><span class="line">17</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="meta">@Component</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@RabbitListener(queues = QueueConfig.QUEUE_MESSAGE)</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">class</span> <span class="title class_">MessageListener</span> {</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 监听消息</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> msg</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@RabbitHandler</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">msg</span><span class="params">(<span class="meta">@Payload</span> Object msg)</span>{</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">SimpleDateFormat</span> <span class="variable">dateFormat</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">SimpleDateFormat</span>(<span class="string">"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> System.out.println(<span class="string">"当前时间:"</span>+dateFormat.format(<span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">Date</span>()));</span><br><span class="line"> System.out.println(<span class="string">"收到信息:"</span>+msg);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h5 id="4-2-3-4-创建启动类"><a href="#4-2-3-4-创建启动类" class="headerlink" title="4.2.3.4 创建启动类"></a>4.2.3.4 创建启动类</h5><figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="meta">@EnableRabbit</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">class</span> <span class="title class_">SpringRabbitMQApplication</span> {</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">static</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">main</span><span class="params">(String[] args)</span> {</span><br><span class="line"> SpringApplication.run(SpringRabbitMQApplication.class,args);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h5 id="4-2-3-5-测试"><a href="#4-2-3-5-测试" class="headerlink" title="4.2.3.5 测试"></a>4.2.3.5 测试</h5><figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br><span class="line">16</span><br><span class="line">17</span><br><span class="line">18</span><br><span class="line">19</span><br><span class="line">20</span><br><span class="line">21</span><br><span class="line">22</span><br><span class="line">23</span><br><span class="line">24</span><br><span class="line">25</span><br><span class="line">26</span><br><span class="line">27</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="meta">@SpringBootTest</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@RunWith(SpringRunner.class)</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">class</span> <span class="title class_">RabbitMQTest</span> {</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Autowired</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> RabbitTemplate rabbitTemplate;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 发送消息</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Test</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">sendMessage</span><span class="params">()</span> <span class="keyword">throws</span> InterruptedException, IOException {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">SimpleDateFormat</span> <span class="variable">dateFormat</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">SimpleDateFormat</span>(<span class="string">"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> System.out.println(<span class="string">"发送当前时间:"</span>+dateFormat.format(<span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">Date</span>()));</span><br><span class="line"> Map<String,String> message = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">HashMap</span><>();</span><br><span class="line"> message.put(<span class="string">"name"</span>,<span class="string">"szitheima"</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> rabbitTemplate.convertAndSend(QueueConfig.QUEUE_MESSAGE_DELAY, message, <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">MessagePostProcessor</span>() {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Override</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> Message <span class="title function_">postProcessMessage</span><span class="params">(Message message)</span> <span class="keyword">throws</span> AmqpException {</span><br><span class="line"> message.getMessageProperties().setExpiration(<span class="string">"10000"</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> message;</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"> });</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> System.in.read();</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>其中message.getMessageProperties().setExpiration(“10000”);设置消息超时时间,超时后，会将消息转入到另外一个队列。</p> <p>测试效果如下：</p> <p><img src="C:/Users/再难也会过/Desktop/尚硅谷SSM笔记/畅购商城/畅购-讲师源码md课件等www.cx1314.cn/畅购-讲师源码md课件/day14续/讲义/images/1558853755945.png" alt="1558853755945"></p> <h2 id="5-库存回滚-作业"><a href="#5-库存回滚-作业" class="headerlink" title="5 库存回滚(作业)"></a>5 库存回滚(作业)</h2><h3 id="5-1-秒杀流程回顾"><a href="#5-1-秒杀流程回顾" class="headerlink" title="5.1 秒杀流程回顾"></a>5.1 秒杀流程回顾</h3><p><img src="C:/Users/再难也会过/Desktop/尚硅谷SSM笔记/畅购商城/畅购-讲师源码md课件等www.cx1314.cn/畅购-讲师源码md课件/day14续/讲义/images/1558832314454.png" alt="1558832314454"></p> <p>如上图，步骤分析如下：</p> <figure class="highlight properties"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="attr">1.用户抢单，经过秒杀系统实现抢单，下单后会将向MQ发送一个延时队列消息，包含抢单信息，延时半小时后才能监听到</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="attr">2.秒杀系统同时启用延时消息监听，一旦监听到订单抢单信息，判断Redis缓存中是否存在订单信息，如果存在，则回滚</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="attr">3.秒杀系统还启动支付回调信息监听，如果支付完成，则将订单吃句话到MySQL，如果没完成，清理排队信息回滚库存</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="attr">4.每次秒杀下单后调用支付系统，创建二维码，如果用户支付成功了，微信系统会将支付信息发送给支付系统指定的回调地址，支付系统收到信息后，将信息发送给MQ，第3个步骤就可以监听到消息了。</span></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>延时队列实现订单关闭回滚库存：</p> <figure class="highlight plaintext"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line">1.创建一个过期队列 Queue1</span><br><span class="line">2.接收消息的队列 Queue2</span><br><span class="line">3.中转交换机</span><br><span class="line">4.监听Queue2</span><br><span class="line"> 1)SeckillStatus->检查Redis中是否有订单信息</span><br><span class="line"> 2)如果有订单信息，调用删除订单回滚库存->[需要先关闭微信支付]</span><br><span class="line"> 3)如果关闭订单时，用于已支付，修改订单状态即可</span><br><span class="line"> 4)如果关闭订单时，发生了别的错误，记录日志，人工处理</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h3 id="5-2-关闭支付"><a href="#5-2-关闭支付" class="headerlink" title="5.2 关闭支付"></a>5.2 关闭支付</h3><p>用户如果半个小时没有支付，我们会关闭支付订单，但在关闭之前，需要先关闭微信支付，防止中途用户支付。</p> <p>修改支付微服务的WeixinPayService，添加关闭支付方法，代码如下：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 关闭支付</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> orderId</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line">Map<String,String> <span class="title function_">closePay</span><span class="params">(Long orderId)</span> <span class="keyword">throws</span> Exception;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>修改WeixinPayServiceImpl，实现关闭微信支付方法，代码如下：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br><span class="line">16</span><br><span class="line">17</span><br><span class="line">18</span><br><span class="line">19</span><br><span class="line">20</span><br><span class="line">21</span><br><span class="line">22</span><br><span class="line">23</span><br><span class="line">24</span><br><span class="line">25</span><br><span class="line">26</span><br><span class="line">27</span><br><span class="line">28</span><br><span class="line">29</span><br><span class="line">30</span><br><span class="line">31</span><br><span class="line">32</span><br><span class="line">33</span><br><span class="line">34</span><br><span class="line">35</span><br><span class="line">36</span><br><span class="line">37</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 关闭微信支付</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> orderId</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@throws</span> Exception</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@Override</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> Map<String, String> <span class="title function_">closePay</span><span class="params">(Long orderId)</span> <span class="keyword">throws</span> Exception {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//参数设置</span></span><br><span class="line"> Map<String,String> paramMap = <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">HashMap</span><String,String>();</span><br><span class="line"> paramMap.put(<span class="string">"appid"</span>,appid); <span class="comment">//应用ID</span></span><br><span class="line"> paramMap.put(<span class="string">"mch_id"</span>,partner); <span class="comment">//商户编号</span></span><br><span class="line"> paramMap.put(<span class="string">"nonce_str"</span>,WXPayUtil.generateNonceStr());<span class="comment">//随机字符</span></span><br><span class="line"> paramMap.put(<span class="string">"out_trade_no"</span>,String.valueOf(orderId)); <span class="comment">//商家的唯一编号</span></span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//将Map数据转成XML字符</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">String</span> <span class="variable">xmlParam</span> <span class="operator">=</span> WXPayUtil.generateSignedXml(paramMap,partnerkey);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//确定url</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">String</span> <span class="variable">url</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="string">"https://api.mch.weixin.qq.com/pay/closeorder"</span>;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//发送请求</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">HttpClient</span> <span class="variable">httpClient</span> <span class="operator">=</span> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">HttpClient</span>(url);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//https</span></span><br><span class="line"> httpClient.setHttps(<span class="literal">true</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//提交参数</span></span><br><span class="line"> httpClient.setXmlParam(xmlParam);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//提交</span></span><br><span class="line"> httpClient.post();</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//获取返回数据</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">String</span> <span class="variable">content</span> <span class="operator">=</span> httpClient.getContent();</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//将返回数据解析成Map</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> WXPayUtil.xmlToMap(content);</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h3 id="5-3-关闭订单回滚库存"><a href="#5-3-关闭订单回滚库存" class="headerlink" title="5.3 关闭订单回滚库存"></a>5.3 关闭订单回滚库存</h3><h4 id="5-3-1-配置延时队列"><a href="#5-3-1-配置延时队列" class="headerlink" title="5.3.1 配置延时队列"></a>5.3.1 配置延时队列</h4><p>在application.yml文件中引入队列信息配置，如下：</p> <figure class="highlight properties"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">#位置支付交换机和队列</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="attr">mq</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">pay</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">exchange</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">order</span>: <span class="string">exchange.order</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">queue</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">order</span>: <span class="string">queue.order</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">seckillorder</span>: <span class="string">queue.seckillorder</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">seckillordertimer</span>: <span class="string">queue.seckillordertimer</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">seckillordertimerdelay</span>: <span class="string">queue.seckillordertimerdelay</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">routing</span>:<span class="string"></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">orderkey</span>: <span class="string">queue.order</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="attr">seckillorderkey</span>: <span class="string">queue.seckillorder</span></span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>配置队列与交换机,在SeckillApplication中添加如下方法</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br><span class="line">16</span><br><span class="line">17</span><br><span class="line">18</span><br><span class="line">19</span><br><span class="line">20</span><br><span class="line">21</span><br><span class="line">22</span><br><span class="line">23</span><br><span class="line">24</span><br><span class="line">25</span><br><span class="line">26</span><br><span class="line">27</span><br><span class="line">28</span><br><span class="line">29</span><br><span class="line">30</span><br><span class="line">31</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">/**</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 到期数据队列</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> Queue <span class="title function_">seckillOrderTimerQueue</span><span class="params">()</span> {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">Queue</span>(env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.queue.seckillordertimer"</span>), <span class="literal">true</span>);</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">/**</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 超时数据队列</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> Queue <span class="title function_">delaySeckillOrderTimerQueue</span><span class="params">()</span> {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> QueueBuilder.durable(env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.queue.seckillordertimerdelay"</span>))</span><br><span class="line"> .withArgument(<span class="string">"x-dead-letter-exchange"</span>, env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.exchange.order"</span>)) <span class="comment">// 消息超时进入死信队列，绑定死信队列交换机</span></span><br><span class="line"> .withArgument(<span class="string">"x-dead-letter-routing-key"</span>, env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.queue.seckillordertimer"</span>)) <span class="comment">// 绑定指定的routing-key</span></span><br><span class="line"> .build();</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 交换机与队列绑定</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@return</span></span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@Bean</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> Binding <span class="title function_">basicBinding</span><span class="params">()</span> {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> BindingBuilder.bind(seckillOrderTimerQueue())</span><br><span class="line"> .to(basicExchange())</span><br><span class="line"> .with(env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.queue.seckillordertimer"</span>));</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h4 id="5-3-2-发送延时消息"><a href="#5-3-2-发送延时消息" class="headerlink" title="5.3.2 发送延时消息"></a>5.3.2 发送延时消息</h4><p>修改MultiThreadingCreateOrder，添加如下方法：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 发送延时消息到RabbitMQ中</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> seckillStatus</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">sendTimerMessage</span><span class="params">(SeckillStatus seckillStatus)</span>{</span><br><span class="line"> rabbitTemplate.convertAndSend(env.getProperty(<span class="string">"mq.pay.queue.seckillordertimerdelay"</span>), (Object) JSON.toJSONString(seckillStatus), <span class="keyword">new</span> <span class="title class_">MessagePostProcessor</span>() {</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Override</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> Message <span class="title function_">postProcessMessage</span><span class="params">(Message message)</span> <span class="keyword">throws</span> AmqpException {</span><br><span class="line"> message.getMessageProperties().setExpiration(<span class="string">"10000"</span>);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">return</span> message;</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"> });</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <p>在createOrder方法中调用上面方法，如下代码：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="comment">//发送延时消息到MQ中</span></span><br><span class="line">sendTimerMessage(seckillStatus);</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h4 id="5-3-3-库存回滚"><a href="#5-3-3-库存回滚" class="headerlink" title="5.3.3 库存回滚"></a>5.3.3 库存回滚</h4><p>创建SeckillOrderDelayMessageListener实现监听消息，并回滚库存，代码如下：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br><span class="line">16</span><br><span class="line">17</span><br><span class="line">18</span><br><span class="line">19</span><br><span class="line">20</span><br><span class="line">21</span><br><span class="line">22</span><br><span class="line">23</span><br><span class="line">24</span><br><span class="line">25</span><br><span class="line">26</span><br><span class="line">27</span><br><span class="line">28</span><br><span class="line">29</span><br><span class="line">30</span><br><span class="line">31</span><br><span class="line">32</span><br><span class="line">33</span><br><span class="line">34</span><br><span class="line">35</span><br><span class="line">36</span><br><span class="line">37</span><br><span class="line">38</span><br><span class="line">39</span><br><span class="line">40</span><br><span class="line">41</span><br><span class="line">42</span><br><span class="line">43</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="meta">@Component</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="meta">@RabbitListener(queues = "${mq.pay.queue.seckillordertimer}")</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">class</span> <span class="title class_">SeckillOrderDelayMessageListener</span> {</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Autowired</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> RedisTemplate redisTemplate;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Autowired</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> SeckillOrderService seckillOrderService;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@Autowired</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">private</span> WeixinPayFeign weixinPayFeign;</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">/***</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 读取消息</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 判断Redis中是否存在对应的订单</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * 如果存在，则关闭支付，再关闭订单</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> * <span class="doctag">@param</span> message</span></span><br><span class="line"><span class="comment"> */</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="meta">@RabbitHandler</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">public</span> <span class="keyword">void</span> <span class="title function_">consumeMessage</span><span class="params">(<span class="meta">@Payload</span> String message)</span>{</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//读取消息</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">SeckillStatus</span> <span class="variable">seckillStatus</span> <span class="operator">=</span> JSON.parseObject(message,SeckillStatus.class);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//获取Redis中订单信息</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">String</span> <span class="variable">username</span> <span class="operator">=</span> seckillStatus.getUsername();</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">SeckillOrder</span> <span class="variable">seckillOrder</span> <span class="operator">=</span> (SeckillOrder) redisTemplate.boundHashOps(<span class="string">"SeckillOrder"</span>).get(username);</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//如果Redis中有订单信息，说明用户未支付</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">if</span>(seckillOrder!=<span class="literal">null</span>){</span><br><span class="line"> System.out.println(<span class="string">"准备回滚---"</span>+seckillStatus);</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//关闭支付</span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="type">Result</span> <span class="variable">closeResult</span> <span class="operator">=</span> weixinPayFeign.closePay(seckillStatus.getOrderId());</span><br><span class="line"> Map<String,String> closeMap = (Map<String, String>) closeResult.getData();</span><br><span class="line"></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">if</span>(closeMap!=<span class="literal">null</span> && closeMap.get(<span class="string">"return_code"</span>).equalsIgnoreCase(<span class="string">"success"</span>) &&</span><br><span class="line"> closeMap.get(<span class="string">"result_code"</span>).equalsIgnoreCase(<span class="string">"success"</span>) ){</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="comment">//关闭订单</span></span><br><span class="line"> seckillOrderService.closeOrder(username);</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line"> }</span><br><span class="line">}</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h1 id="总结"><a href="#总结" class="headerlink" title="总结"></a>总结</h1><p>需求分析 + 设计 + 技术选型 + 引入demo并测试 + 编写业务逻辑 + </p> </div> <div class="article-info article-info-index"> <p class="article-more-link"> <a class="article-more-a" href="/2022/10/08/projecet/%E7%A7%92%E6%9D%80%E6%A8%A1%E5%9D%97/">展开全文 >></a> </p> <div class="clearfix"></div> </div> </div> </article> <aside class="wrap-side-operation"> <div class="mod-side-operation"> <div class="jump-container" id="js-jump-container" style="display:none;"> <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="mod-side-operation__jump-to-top"> <i class="icon-font icon-back"></i> </a> <div id="js-jump-plan-container" class="jump-plan-container" style="top: -11px;"> <i class="icon-font icon-plane jump-plane"></i> </div> </div> </div> </aside> <article id="post-projecet/用户登陆 & JWT & Oauth2.0" class="article article-type-post article-index" itemscope itemprop="blogPost"> <div class="article-inner"> <div class="article-entry" itemprop="articleBody"> <h2 id="3-用户登录"><a href="#3-用户登录" class="headerlink" title="3 用户登录"></a>3 用户登录</h2><p>项目中有2个重要角色，分别为管理员和用户，下面几章我们将实现购物下单和支付，用户如果没登录是没法下单和支付的，所以我们这里需要实现一个登录功能。</p> <h3 id="3-1-表结构介绍"><a href="#3-1-表结构介绍" class="headerlink" title="3.1 表结构介绍"></a>3.1 表结构介绍</h3><p>changgou_user表如下：</p> <p><img src="D:/git-demo/畅购-讲师源码md课件/day08gateway和jwt/讲义/images/1562050583653.png" alt="1562050583653"></p> <p>用户信息表tb_user</p> <figure class="highlight sql"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span class="line">8</span><br><span class="line">9</span><br><span class="line">10</span><br><span class="line">11</span><br><span class="line">12</span><br><span class="line">13</span><br><span class="line">14</span><br><span class="line">15</span><br><span class="line">16</span><br><span class="line">17</span><br><span class="line">18</span><br><span class="line">19</span><br><span class="line">20</span><br><span class="line">21</span><br><span class="line">22</span><br><span class="line">23</span><br><span class="line">24</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="keyword">CREATE</span> <span class="keyword">TABLE</span> `tb_user` (</span><br><span class="line"> `username` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">50</span>) <span class="keyword">NOT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'用户名'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `password` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">100</span>) <span class="keyword">NOT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'密码，加密存储'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `phone` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">20</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'注册手机号'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `email` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">50</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'注册邮箱'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `created` datetime <span class="keyword">NOT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'创建时间'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `updated` datetime <span class="keyword">NOT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'修改时间'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `source_type` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">1</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'会员来源：1:PC，2：H5，3：Android，4：IOS'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `nick_name` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">50</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'昵称'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `name` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">50</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'真实姓名'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `status` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">1</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'使用状态（1正常 0非正常）'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `head_pic` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">150</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'头像地址'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `qq` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">20</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'QQ号码'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `is_mobile_check` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">1</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="string">'0'</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'手机是否验证 （0否 1是）'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `is_email_check` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">1</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="string">'0'</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'邮箱是否检测（0否 1是）'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `sex` <span class="type">varchar</span>(<span class="number">1</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="string">'1'</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'性别，1男，0女'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `user_level` <span class="type">int</span>(<span class="number">11</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'会员等级'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `points` <span class="type">int</span>(<span class="number">11</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'积分'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `experience_value` <span class="type">int</span>(<span class="number">11</span>) <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'经验值'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `birthday` datetime <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'出生年月日'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> `last_login_time` datetime <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> <span class="keyword">NULL</span> COMMENT <span class="string">'最后登录时间'</span>,</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">PRIMARY</span> KEY (`username`),</span><br><span class="line"> <span class="keyword">UNIQUE</span> KEY `username` (`username`) <span class="keyword">USING</span> BTREE</span><br><span class="line">) ENGINE<span class="operator">=</span>InnoDB <span class="keyword">DEFAULT</span> CHARSET<span class="operator">=</span>utf8 COMMENT<span class="operator">=</span><span class="string">'用户表'</span>;</span><br></pre></td></tr></table></figure> <h3 id="3-2-用户微服务创建"><a href="#3-2-用户微服务创建" class="headerlink" title="3.2 用户微服务创建"></a>3.2 用户微服务创建</h3><p>创建工程之前，先使用代码生成器生成对应的业务代码。</p> <p>(1)公共API创建</p> <p>在changgou-service-api中创建changgou-service-user-api，并将pojo拷贝到工程中，如下图：</p> <p><img src="D:/git-demo/畅购-讲师源码md课件/day08gateway和jwt/讲义/images/1562051835630.png" alt="1562051835630"></p> <p>在changgou-service中创建changgou-service-user微服务,并引入生成的业务逻辑代码，如下图：</p> <p><img src="D:/git-demo/畅购-讲师源码md课件/day08gateway和jwt/讲义/images/1562051932945.png" alt="1562051932945"></p> <p>(2)依赖</p> <p>在changgou-service-user的pom.xml引入如下依赖：</p> <figure class="highlight xml"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">18</span><br><span class="line">19</span><br><span class="line">20</span><br><span class="line">21</span><br></pre></td><td class="code"><pre><span class="line"><span class="meta"><?xml class="name">artifactId</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"><<span class="name">groupId</span>></span>com.changgou<span class="tag"></<span class="name">groupId</span>></span></span><br><span class="line"> <span class="tag"><<span class="name">version</span>></span>1.0-SNAPSHOT<span class="tag"></<span <p>在changgou-service-user微服务中创建启动类com.changgou.UserApplication，代码如下：</p> <figure class="highlight java"><table><tr><td class="gutter"><pre><span class="line">1</span><br><span class="line">2</span><br><span class="line">3</span><br><span class="line">4</span><br><span class="line">5</span><br><span class="line">6</span><br><span class="line">7</span><br><span
